org.openscience.cdk.controller
Class CDKPopupMenu

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPopupMenu
                  org.openscience.cdk.controller.CDKPopupMenu
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.MenuElement
public class CDKPopupMenu
extends javax.swing.JPopupMenu

Basically, identical to the JPopupMenu class, except that this menu can also contain the source for which it was popped up.

IMPORTANT: The very nature of this design can lead to race conditions. It would be better that the Event passed to the popup menu would define the IChemObject source.

Author:
Egon Willighagen
See Also:
Serialized Form
Created on:
2003-07-36
Requires:
swing
Belongs to CDK module:
controlold
Source code:
